snippet: Doc Rivers, the Clippers’ coach, has become the voice of the franchise, addressing employees on and off the court.
abstract: Los Angeles Clippers coach Doc Rivers has become voice of the franchise following lifetime ban issued against team owner Donald Sterling; Rivers has spent time reassuring employees even as he wrestles with pressures of playoff series against the Golden State Warriors.
lead_paragraph: Doc Rivers, the Clippers’ coach, has become the voice of the franchise, addressing employees on and off the court.

headline.main: As Game 7 Nears, Rivers Takes Time for Workers
